feed.title: The RAW and The COOKED - cooked_events

entry.title: Live Electronic Performances
entry.summary: Andrea Guidi, Eddie Wade, Loraine James, Ewa Justka, Tom Gurion, James Doherty, Lia Mice, 7xins, Wandering Oscillators, Paul Hierophant, A Colder Consciousness... and more TBC.
entry.content: Andrea Guidi, Eddie Wade, Loraine James, Ewa Justka, Tom Gurion, James Doherty, Lia Mice, 7xins, Wandering Oscillators, Paul Hierophant, A Colder Consciousness... and more TBC.

entry.title: Keynote Talk - Ewa Justka
entry.summary: DIY instrument maker and electronic performer Ewa Justka talks about her practice, her instruments and her approach to DIY.
entry.content: DIY instrument maker and electronic performer Ewa Justka talks about her practice, her instruments and her approach to DIY.

entry.title: Keynote Talk - Tom Whitwell
entry.summary: DIY Modular guru Tom Whitwell from Music Thing Modular discusses designing your fist modular unit.
entry.content: DIY Modular guru Tom Whitwell from Music Thing Modular discusses designing your fist modular unit.

entry.title: QMUL Talk - Lia Mice
entry.summary: Producer, DJ, and instrument designer Lia Mice discusses drawing inspiration from science-fiction to explore how the sampler is a time machine - interacting with the past, present and future, and the experiments that are the foundation of her upcoming LP The Sampler As A Time Machine, out November 9 on Optimo â€¦
entry.content: Producer, DJ, and instrument designer Lia Mice discusses drawing inspiration from science-fiction to explore how the sampler is a time machine - interacting with the past, present and future, and the experiments that are the foundation of her upcoming LP The Sampler As A Time Machine, out November 9 on Optimo Music.

entry.title: Workshop - Bela
entry.summary: The bela team show you how to make an ultra low latency Digital Musial Instrument.
entry.content: The bela team show you how to make an ultra low latency Digital Musial Instrument.

entry.title: Worksop - GMSN!
entry.summary: GMSN!'s Rob Spencer walks you through building your own modular synth unit.
entry.content: GMSN!'s Rob Spencer walks you through building your own modular synth unit.
